articles.description: India opener Shubman Gill has been passed fit to take his place in the squad for the last two Tests against England, with seamer Umesh Yadav recalled.
articles.content:
India opener Shubman Gill has been passed fit to take his place in the squad for the last two Tests against England, with seamer Umesh Yadav recalled.

articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti experiencing Everton mentality problem and players have been let off the hook - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: The first part of our latest column from Michael Ball looks back on the news around the proposed Bramley-Moore Dock move, the defeat to Fulham and Everton's squad depth.
articles.content:

articles.title: England spinner Moeen Ali not at fault for leaving bubble, says Nasser Hussain - Daily Mail
articles.description: NASSER HUSSAIN: We must respect the choice Moeen Ali made to leave England's Test tour of India even though he is only just back into the side following an absence of 18 months.
